metadata.name: DREGGONS Mint Pass #1
metadata.description: If a Dreggons Mint Pass is held during the holder snapshot, it will grant you the privilege of 1 FREE Dreggons Mint before pre-sale and 2 Guaranteed Mints during pre-sale. The holders during the snapshot will always be remembered by us because this is proof that you were one of our early supporters. After the Holder Snapshot, these passes will no longer be valid for any privileges. Dreggons is a collection of 4444 NFTs containing 33 Dragon Eggs with different rarities. Dreggons holders receive access to exclusive drops, experiences, and more.
